Nigiri Sushi (Tuna).description: Fresh tuna slices on a bed of sushi rice, served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

Salmon Sashimi.description: Thinly sliced fresh salmon, served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

California Roll.description: A classic roll with rice, crab, avocado, and cucumber wrapped in seaweed.

Eel Unagi Nigiri.description: Grilled eel on a small bed of rice, drizzled with eel sauce and served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

Rainbow Roll.description: A colorful roll with rice, assorted sashimi slices, and avocado, wrapped in seaweed.
